programme.title: Night Fire
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Night Fire, S02E05, The Northern Lights are more than just beautiful; they tell us about the make up of our planet, our sun, and may even be a signpost for the possibility of life on other planets.

programme.title: Cosmic Rainbow
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Cosmic Rainbow, S02E03, In the world of astronomy, how do we overcome the limits imposed by our own eyesight? The universe comes alive by viewing the cosmos in infrared light to gamma radiation.

programme.title: Borderland / Mars: Red Dawn
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas, S01E15, See the sun, moon, planets, and galaxies through the eyes of intrepid machines that are blazing a trail across the solar system. A gateway to bold adventures, these cameras are delivering spectacular new cosmic vistas.

programme.title: Water Worlds
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Water Worlds, S03E03, The key ingredient to life in the universe is water. Until recently we thought Earth was the only place in the solar system to have any water at all. Now that probes are peering around nearby worlds we are finding that is just not the case.

programme.title: Shooting Gallery: Asteroids and Comets / Galactic Visions: Alien Worlds
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas, S01E18, See the sun, moon, planets, and galaxies through the eyes of intrepid machines that are blazing a trail across the solar system. A gateway to bold adventures, these cameras are delivering spectacular new cosmic vistas.

programme.title: Superscopes
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Superscopes, S02E02, The human eye can only see visible light, a small spectrum of electromagnetic waves. Today, we have instruments that let us perceive all wavelengths.

programme.title: What Is Space?
programme.desc: The Fabric of the Cosmos: What Is Space?, S01E01, Brian Greene reveals space as a dynamic fabric that can stretch, twist, warp, and ripple under the influence of gravity, and explores dark energy, which makes up 70% of the universe.

programme.title: The Illusion of Time
programme.desc: The Fabric of the Cosmos: The Illusion of Time, S01E02, Brian Greene takes us on the ultimate time traveling adventure, hurtling 50 years into the future before stepping into a wormhole to travel back to Big Bang.

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.desc: The Fabric of the Cosmos: Quantum Leap, S01E03, Join Brian Greene on a wild ride into the weird realm of quantum physics, which governs the universe on the tiniest of scales.

programme.title: Universe or Multiverse?
programme.desc: The Fabric of the Cosmos: Universe or Multiverse?, S01E04, Cutting-edge theories are suggesting that our universe may not be the only universe. Instead, it may be just one of an infinite number of worlds that make up the multiverse.

EARTH´S EVIL TWIN, S05E04, Venus is a planet closest to Earth in distance and size, it once may have been as hospitable to life as Earth is now. Then something changed and Venus became shrouded in hot dense toxic clouds.

programme.title: The Astronauts
programme.desc: The New Frontier: The Astronauts, S02E01, One hundred kilometres above the Earth’s surface lies an invisible frontier: the edge of space.

STAR LIGHT, STAR BRIGHT, S05E01, The two current science missions to our star; the sun have made great leaps forward in the science of how stars work, how they generate solar winds and how they affect their orbiting planets

programme.title: Juno, Cassini and Beyond
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Juno, Cassini and Beyond, S03E05, The Cassini space craft has completed its mission over Saturn, Juno has reached its target and has commenced its scientific observations of the giant planet Jupiter.

programme.title: Martian Attractions
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Martian Attractions, S04E07, The Latest in Martian exploration from orbit and on the ground, new sources of water and planetary dust storms are a few of the stories unfolding on to the Red Planet.

programme.title: The Sun
programme.desc: The New Frontier: The Sun, S01E08, It powers the machinery of nature; our weather, encourages and sustains life on land and at sea.

programme.title: The Ice Giants
programme.desc: The New Frontier: The Ice Giants, S01E06, Beyond the asteroid belt lay the ice giants, some can be seen with the naked eye, others only glimpsed once by a passing probe.

programme.title: Edge of The Universe
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Edge of The Universe, S01E10, The night sky is a time machine. The further we look out into the universe the further back in time we reach.

programme.title: PEERING INTO THE ABYSS

programme.title: Proving Einstein
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Proving Einstein, S04E09, Some of the proof of Einstein’s theories had long been elusive, beyond the capabilities of technology, until now.

programme.title: Hubble's Renaissance
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Hubble's Renaissance, S02E01, Before we can reach space, we must first be able to see it. Hundreds of years ago, the simple telescope was used to give us a seemingly closer vantage. Today, we use the awe-inspiring, and super powerful, Hubble Space Telescope.

programme.title: Landsat
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Landsat, S04E06, Take a look at Landsat 8, the advanced planetary explorer with a 900 million dollar price tag! It is designed to peer across multiple wavelengths to reveal complex and ever-changing details that are undetectable by the human eye.

programme.title: Gravity
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Gravity, S03E04, Gravity has long been a force that has intrigued scientists. Now, for the first time scientists are probing to detect gravity waves in space as well as mapping the gravity patterns of the moon.

programme.title: Vesta Unveiled
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Vesta Unveiled, S03E02, With the Dawn missions exploration of the asteroid Vesta and the dwarf planet Ceres, asteroids are a hot topic. See what these incredible missions have uncovered.

programme.title: Seasons of Saturn
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Seasons of Saturn, S03E01, Saturn is the second largest planet and has an astonishing 60 moons in its orbit. Thanks to the Cassini mission, it's also one of the most studied and most photographed planets in our neighborhood.

programme.title: Milky Way
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Milky Way, S04E01, This episode traces our view of the Milky Way, from the mythology of ancient sky watchers to the efforts of scientists to map it from the inside out.

In the Shadow of the Moon, 20070101080000 +0000, Between 1968 and 1972, the world watched in awe each time an American spacecraft voyaged to the Moon. Only 12 men walked upon its surface and they remain the only human beings to have stood on another world.

programme.title: The Heartland Killer
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E05, In the 1980s, a suspected serial killer preyed on women in small towns located on the banks of the Mississippi River until the murders abruptly ceased and went unsolved.

programme.title: Devil In Disguise
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E06, A 23-year-old teacher vanished the evening before Easter after giving confession. Her body was later found floating in a drainage canal. At the time, a key witness hinted that a member of the Catholic clergy may have been responsible.

programme.title: Love and Hate
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E07, Near what's known as the hanging tree, the mutilated body of Timothy Coggins is found in late 1983. The investigation is thwarted and the case freezes for over 30 years, until a newly elected sheriff vows to bring the killers to justice.

programme.title: Ice Cold in Denver
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E08, On a bitter morning in 1980, radio intern Helene Pruszynski is found brutalized in a snowy field. After 37 years of fruitless leads, investigators tap into a genealogy website that gives them a lead.

programme.title: Murder by Moonlight
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E09, Easter Sunday of 1992, the body of missing woman Lisa Ziegert is found in a field. The investigation yields hundreds of leads but no true suspect. After more than two decades on ice, the case is revived.

programme.title: Suspicious Minds
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E10, In 1984, a 15-year-old girl is found murdered in her grandparents' home. For decades, a stalled investigation only fuels the town rumor mill, pointing an accusing finger at her 13-year-old sister.

programme.title: A Lesson in Homicide
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E11, When a schoolteacher is found murdered in her New Jersey apartment in the fall of 2009, suspicion is cast on her soon to be ex-husband. Long after the case goes cold, a detective embarks on a mission to help the man clear his name.

programme.title: Woman in the Woods
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E12, In August 1972, the body of Jody Loomis is found in the woods. 34 years later, the killer's DNA is recovered from Jody's old clothing but it isn't matched until 2018.

programme.title: Eyes of a Killer
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E13, On February 2, 2010, two masked gunmen commit a violent robbery and shoot Michael Temple Jr., rendering him a quadriplegic for five years before his death. In this unusual cold case, DNA is used to create a sketch of the killer.

programme.title: Dark Angel
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E14, 13 days after Pam Pitts disappears in 1988 her charred body is found at a popular hangout spot in the Arizona desert. When a second victim is discovered in a mineshaft, detectives suspect the killer may have known them both.

programme.title: Friday Night Ghosts
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E15, In late 1983, the bodies of five people abducted from a local fast food restaurant are found brutally murdered. The main suspect is long believed to be a well-connected local man, until new evidence reveals the true killers.

programme.title: The Clock Strikes Murder
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E16, When 23-year-old Tonya McKinley is found brutally murdered on New Years Day 1985, a little boy is left motherless. A family must wait 35 years for advancements in forensic science to finally catch a killer using familial DNA.

programme.title: Sisters In Death
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E17, March 1984. Jack Kennedy discovers his daughters brutally murdered. Their mother and niece spend their lives keeping the case alive. DNA leads nowhere. 30 years later, an informant gives up a name.

programme.title: One Tough Mother
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E18, In July 1997, the brutal murder of 19-year-old Tiffany Johnston rocks the small town of Bethany, Oklahoma. DNA points to her killer over a decade later and leads investigators across state lines.

programme.title: Written In Blood
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E19, In July of 1970, the brutal murder of single mom Loretta Jones leaves four-year-old Heidi motherless. Nearly 40 years later, she vows to solve her mother's cold case.

programme.title: Cold Ashes
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E20, When a deadly house fire claims the life of a family in rural Oklahoma, investigators suspect foul play and it sends a mother on a decades-long crusade to find out what happened to her missing teenage daughter and best friend.

programme.title: Queen of the Ozarks
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E21, In June 1985, a 20-year-old "Sucker Day" Festival Queen is found brutalized. The small community of Nixa, Missouri, is certain her blood is on the hands of a local wealthy businessman, but after 25 years DNA reveals the true killer.
MST3K: Cave Dwellers, 19910531070000 +0000, Wise ruler Akronas (aka “The Great One”) is the keeper of an incredibly powerful but potentially deadly device.
MST3K: Teenage Caveman, 19911109000000 +0000, In Teenage Cave Man (1958), a rebellious cave boy goes against clan rules and wants to explore horizons beyond the river

programme.title: Eegah
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000, S05E06, Driving home one night through the Southern California desert, teenager Roxy Miller encounters Eegah – a 7-foot giant! As Eegah’s fondness for her grows, Can Dr. Miller and Roxy’s boyfriend Tom save her from the clutches of the prehistoric caveman?

programme.title: Horrors of Spider Island
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000, S10E11, A group of showgirls washes up on a deserted island after their plane crashes. Soon they discover the island is home to a large, radioactive spider.
MST3K: The Sinister Urge, 19941105000000 +0000, Two laid back detectives crack down on an underground porn ring while Frank threatens to blow up Deep 13.

programme.title: Code Name: Diamond Head
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Code Name: Diamond Head, S06E08, Counterintelligence takes on new meaning in this barely coherent tale of Hawaiian espionage that takes place on movie sets meant to look like Hawaii.

programme.title: Girl in Gold Boots
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000, S10E02, A girl from rural California goes to Los Angeles to work as a go-go dancer, but soon gets involved with drug dealers.

programme.title: Ring of Terror
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Ring of Terror, S02E06, A medical student (played by George B. Mather) is tormented by a frat-house hazing after being asked to remove a ring from the finger of a corpse.

programme.title: The Castle of FuManchu
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: The Castle of FuManchu, S03E23, The Castle of FuManchu tries to conquer the world by turning all water into ice.

programme.title: Red Zone Cuba
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Red Zone Cuba, S06E19, An escaped convict and his two pals take part in the Bay of Pigs invasion, then return home with a plan to get rich.

The Santa Suit, 20101202000000 +0000, Drake Hunter (Kevin Sorbo), the president of Hunter Marketing, has the perfect plan to boost sales for his father's toy company over the holiday season—hire department store Santas to promote his father's merchandise.

The Wishing Tree, 20121110000000 +0000, A young professor supervises several "orphan" students who have nowhere to go for the holidays. He brings them together through The Wishing Tree--a Christmas tree decorated with handwritten wishes. Stars Jason Gedrick.
Window Wonderland, 20130101000000 +0000, Hallmark Original Movie. Sloan Van Doren is hoping to take over the head window designer spot.

A Dog Named Christmas, 20091129000000 +0000, A developmentally-challenged young man is determined to prove to his family that he can care for a dog on his own. In his triumph, he inspires his father to love the new member of the family. Stars Bruce Greenwood, Linda Emond.
A Nutcracker Christmas, 20160101000000 +0000, Hallmark Original Movie. A jaded ex-ballerina is forced to come to terms with the life she left behind.

Broadcasting Christmas, 20161127000000 +0000, Two exes compete for the same co-host position at the nation's favorite morning show in Manhattan. They'll both do what it takes to get ahead, but the fire that burned between them hasn't quite burned out.
Christmas Festival of Ice, 20170101000000 +0000, Hallmark Original Movie. Emma sets out to save her town's beloved ice sculpture contest.

Christmas in Conway, 20131201000000 +0000, Hoping it will be the perfect Christmas present for his wife (Mary-Louise Parker), a man (Andy Garcia) plans to construct a Ferris wheel in his backyard. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.
Christmas with Tucker, 20131125000000 +0000, Thirteen-year-old George struggles to deal with the death of his father and is helped through this trying time by his friendship with a dog named Tucker.

I'll Be Home for Christmas, 20161127000000 +0000, Jackie Foster has the perfect life until her dad Jack returns home and reluctantly agrees to spend Christmas with her and her daughter Gracie. Stars James Brolin, Mena Suvari and Giselle Eisenberg.

programme.title: Jolinar's Memories
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S03E12, Carter's father has been captured on a moon transformed into hell. No one but Jolinar has ever escaped from hell, so Tok'ra technology is used to access Jolinar's memories from Carter's mind…but not before an old foe shows up to foil the mission!

programme.title: Midway
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S04E17, The IOA has entrusted Mr. Coolidge, with interviewing Teyla Emmagan and Ronan Dex about their suitability to continue with the Atlantis expedition. Unbeknownst to anyone, a plan by the Wraith to invade the Midway station is about to be initiated.

programme.title: The Kindred (Part 1)
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S04E18, Teyla, more determined than ever to find the missing Athosians, convinces Sheppard to travel with her to a trading settlement in search for answers. What they find there leads them to startling discovery that no one could have anticipated.

programme.title: The Kindred (Part 2)
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S04E19, After an unforeseen return, Dr. Carson Beckett shares that he has been held captive. As Teyla is re-united with some missing fellow Athosians, she begins to formulate a plan to ensure their escape, if she is able to find them in time.

programme.title: The Last Man
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S04E20, Disheartened by another unsuccessful search for Teyla, Lt. Colonel Sheppard returns to Atlantis and senses that something is not right—the city has been abandoned. Now, McKay sets out on a risky plan to reverse a future that went horribly wrong.

programme.title: Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E01, As Sheppard and Ronon are trapped beneath a collapsed compound, McKay and Lorne are trapped in another pocket of debris. Michael’s flagship Wraith Cruiser hurtles towards the compound, while Carter leads a rescue mission. Who will reach them first?

programme.title: The Seed
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E02, When Dr. Keller fails to report for her shift, concerned team members are shocked to discover her unconscious in her quarters. With the situation on Atlantis escalating, Woolsey is ultimately faced with a decision that could cost Keller her life.

programme.title: Broken Ties
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E03, During an off-world mission, Ronon (Jason Momoa) is ambushed and captured by his former friend, Tyre (Mark Dacascos), and turned over to the Wraith. As the team scrambles for leads to locate their friend, Ronon undergoes a torturous ordeal.

programme.title: The Daedalus Variations
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E04, A drive malfunction aboard a mysterious duplicate Daedalus sends the team jumping through various alternate realities where they encounter sinister alien life forms, a searing sun, and a pitched space battle over Atlantis.

programme.title: Faith
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E13, Dwindling supplies, tedious routines, and low morale continue to plague the crew of the Destiny when the ship suddenly drops out of FTL and enters the orbit of an uncharted star. But, for the first time, the countdown clock doesn’t activate!

programme.title: Human
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E14, Disregarding orders, Dr. Rush links himself to the Destiny’s computer via the neural interface chair, hoping it will reveal the code needed to control Destiny’s flight path. Learning of this, Col. Young struggles with letting Rush risk his life.

programme.title: Lost
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E15, Trapped beneath ruins in an underground maze, some of the Destiny's crew are stranded when the ship jumps back into FTL. The situation grows even more desperate when Rush (Robert Carlyle) learns that Destiny will soon be leaving the galaxy!

programme.title: Sabotage
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E16, With crew members stranded, Destiny continues to cross from the present galaxy into the next one. Unable to alter the Destiny's course, Dr. Rush calculates the Destiny will fall short of making it to the next galaxy, stranding them indefinitely.

programme.title: The Devil You Know
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S03E13, During a rescue attempt, SG-1 is caught by one of hell's denizens, who is determined to use the information they have to overthrow Goa'uld lord Sokar. Using Tok'ra technology, the team is forced to relive painful memories…but how much can they take?

programme.title: Foothold
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S03E14, During routine medical exams, Dr. Fraiser injects each team member with a sedative. Teal'c awakens and sees General Hammond conspiring with Fraiser and two aliens. What has happened at Stargate Command, and can SG-1 overpower its own allies?

programme.title: Pretense
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S03E15, When SG-1 is invited to planet Tollan to attend a Triad ceremony, they are shocked to discover it is actually a trial to determine the fate of their friend Skaara. Daniel and O'Neill must argue a case against a mysterious Goa'uld to save Skaara.

programme.title: Urgo
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S03E16, En route to a planet, the SG-1 are implanted with an alien spore that evolves into a being called Urgo. Though Urgo claims to be friendly, the suspicious team members work feverishly to rid themselves of the creature before it destroys their minds.

programme.title: Lover's Leap
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E05, Valerie is haunted by nightmares about her father's suicide. David learns that his mother requires shock therapy to improve her chances of recovery. Toni throws a dinner party while her father is out of town.

programme.title: Speechless
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E06, Valerie gets herself invited on a road trip with Kelly, Donna and Clare. Steve convinces Brandon to let a director film a movie at the Walsh house. Marchette tells Toni that Dylan is using her.

programme.title: Violated
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E07, Valerie accepts her marketing professor's invitation to a seminar. Bruno delivers a letter from Dylan to Toni. Steve and Clare quarrel after booking a motel room. Donna resists Ray's relentless attempts at a reconciliation.

programme.title: Gypsies, Cramps and Fleas
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E08, A fortune teller sets up shop at the Peach Pit for Halloween. In spite of her questionable credibility, her presence has an impact on many couples.

programme.title: Earthquake Weather
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E09, Dylan asks Toni to marry him. An earthquake rocks the major Los Angeles area, spooking Colin. Donna sees her mother in a photograph of the 1969 Rose Court contestants, but Felice refuses to explain herself.

programme.title: One Wedding and a Funeral
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E10, The guys kidnap Dylan for his bachelor party. The girls throw a much wilder time for bride-to-be Toni.

programme.title: Offensive Interference
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E11, Donna makes the Rose Court, and her mother reveals her reasons for not supporting her in the pageant.

programme.title: Breast Side Up
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E12, Colin and Susan leave for New York to spend Thanksgiving with their families. The gang decides to spend the holiday together, and David invites his mother to join them.

programme.title: Courting
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E13, Joe rejects a plea bargain and decides to go to trial. The Associated Press picks up Brandon's story about the trial for nationwide syndication. Colin babysits for Erin while Kelly and David are at the trial.

programme.title: Fortunate Son
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E14, Donna fills in for Lisa at a convenience store. A young boy is caught stealing a teddy bear for his brother's birthday, but Donna covers for him. Brandon alienates Nat and Susan as he gets carried away during the After Dark's charity casino night.

programme.title: Angels We Have Heard on High
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E15, Cindy surprises Brandon by coming to visit for Christmas. Joe tries to keep an antsy Donna in suspense about her Christmas/birthday present.

programme.title: Fade In, Fade Out
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E17, Kelly's father swoops into town, and once again sweeps her off of her feet with promises of a relationship. Nat is reunited with an old-flame.

programme.title: Snowbound
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E18, Kelly takes refuge back with Colin, and ends up on a bender.

programme.title: Nancy's Choice
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E19, Susan is nominated for a college journalism award for her story about a girl's decision to have an abortion. Valerie arranges a meeting between Colin and a knowledgeable art buyer in the hopes of encouraging Colin to get clean and focus on his career.

programme.title: Flying
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E20, Valerie's really annoying friend Ginger returns to town. Clare and Donna confront Kelly after finding drugs in the apartment. Brandon, Steve and Joe accept Jonathan's invitation to go flying in biplanes.

programme.title: Bleeding Hearts
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E21, Valerie tries to pacify Ginger by setting her up with Jonathan. Donna's sorority asks students to go without sex for 24 hours in order to promote abstinence as a means of preventing venereal diseases. Clare bets that Steve cannot make good on his pledge.

programme.title: All This and Mary Too
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E22, Colin visits Kelly and announces that he has kicked his cocaine habit. Kelly gets a roommate, a troubled teenage runaway named Tara. Valerie has the house to herself as Steve and Brandon leave for a ski weekend with Clare, Susan and David.

programme.title: Miracle Marine/School Bus
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E194, A marine pilot lost control and plunged 12,000 feet per minute and crashed. A 7-year-old is run over by the front wheels of a bus.

programme.title: Alpine Ski/Falling Glass
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E263, William Shatner hosts re-enactments of real rescues.

programme.title: Escalator Traps Boy/Point Dume
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E259, A child playing on a moving escalator gets his clothes caught in the steps. A teen loses grip hanging from the ledge of a rock face and falls 80 feet to the water's edge.

programme.title: Chemistry Hero/Fireman Down
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E222, A vial begins bubbling during a high school chemistry class. A firefighter is injured and trapped when a 500 lb. building façade collapses directly on top of him.

programme.title: Las Vegas, Part 2/Bootless Hero
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E215, EMS in Las Vegas named number one EMS network in the country. Drinking men go fishing near swampy Everglades.

programme.title: Idaho Trauma/Chimney Trapped Crook
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E305, A 6-year-old girl is hit by a car. A couple is startled when they hear a loud noise inside their fireplace.

programme.title: Chance Encounter/Baby Bathtub Burn
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E372, Rescuers search for a missing hiker in a treacherous canyon. A baby is burned when his sister tries to give him a bath.

programme.title: Sewer Pug/Sand Embankment
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E368, A puppy falls through a crack in a sewer pipe and disappears. A boy is trapped by a sand avalanche he created.

programme.title: Sinking Sisters/Subway Save
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E102, A mother leaves babies strapped in a car that accidentally rolls into water. An unconscious man is laying on subway tracks.

programme.title: ATV 5 Yr Old/Honeybee Horror
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E371, A 5-year old boy tries to drive a four-wheel ATV and loses control. A man mowing disturbs a nest of 4,000 bees.

programme.title: Seattle Cop, Part 2/Digitalis Kid OD
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E240, Continuation of "A 22-year veteran officer shot in the chest during a routine traffic stop". A 2-year-old swallowed her grandmother's heart medicine.

programme.title: Stabbing, Shooting/Fancy Dancer
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E264, William Shatner hosts re-enactments of real rescues.

programme.title: New Daddy Crash/Bubba Saves Chewy
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E285, Two men discover an unconscious man trapped inside a cab. A family's dog is trapped inside the home when it catches fire.

programme.title: Wave Runner, Part 2/Armed Robbery
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E307, A teenager is injured when he's hit in the head by a waterski. A convenience store employee is robbed at gunpoint.

programme.title: Racehorse/Softball Slugger

programme.title: Sandcastles
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E07, Baywatch lifeguards gain insight into the plight of the homeless when Hobie befriends a girl who's living on the streets. Eddie is attacked by a former mental patient known as “Hector the Collector.”

programme.title: Thin or Die
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E08, Eddie goes on a blind date with Nicole, who turns out to be morbidly overweight, which leads to complications and an unlikely friendship. But Nicole's diet pills prove life-threatening. Meanwhile, Mitch’s life is comically disrupted by a stray dog.

programme.title: The Trophy, Part 1
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E09, Eddie is arrested for statutory rape after a teenage girl lies about seducing him in his tower. Meanwhile, Eric Turner, bitter about the paralyzing accident he suffered as a lifeguard, returns to Baywatch to reconcile his relationship with Megan.

programme.title: The Trophy, Part 2
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E10, Eddie is suspended from Baywatch over the statutory rape charge. He feels abandoned when no one believes his innocence pleas. Meanwhile, the reckless, paraplegic Turner, wanting to win Megan back, tries to impress her by hang-gliding off a cliff.

programme.title: If Looks Could Kill
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E11, Mitch falls for the beautiful woman he saved from drowning after she drove her car off a cliff, unaware that she's a cold-blooded murderer and con artist who was attempting to dispose of the murder victim of her latest scam when Mitch rescued her.

programme.title: Reunion
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E12, Mitch and his ex-wife Gayle reconnect at their twenty-year high school reunion with unforeseen results. Eddie discovers an abandoned baby under his tower with a note imploring him to take care of it for 24 hours.

programme.title: War of Nerves
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E13, Drug lord Mason Sato is released from prison and determined to seek revenge Mitch Buchannon, who helped send him away. When Sato kidnaps Hobie and Kaye, Mitch and Sato end up in a samurai-style fight to the death.

programme.title: Big Monday
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E14, Reports of a coming storm and enormous waves bring painful memories for Mitch. Meanwhile, Kaye tries to persuade the parents of a deaf girl to send her to sign-language school.

programme.title: Sea of Flames
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E15, A drugged-out drifter torches Eddie's lifeguard tower which leads the team to discover an illegal, lab distributing a new drug. Mitch and Thorpe try to convince the city board to buy wave runners in order to optimize their ability to save lives.

programme.title: Now Sit Right Back and You'll Hear a Tale
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E16, Eddie slips on the sand and hits his head on the tower ramp. When he regains consciousness, Eddie finds himself on an island with Gilligan, Mary Ann and the rest of the castaways.

programme.title: The Chamber
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E17, Mitch has an out-of-body experience when his attempt to save a trapped diver without scuba gear leaves him with the bends, dangerously close to death and in desperate need of a decompression chamber.

programme.title: Shark's Cove
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E18, Shauni is suspicious when a swimmer training for the Olympics disappears in "Shark's Cove.” Eddie's world is turned upside-down when he is reunited with his schizophrenic half-brother.

programme.title: The Lost Treasure of Tower 12
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E19, A bohemian poet flirts with Shauni, and with danger when he uses his metal detector to find the buried stash of two jewel thieves.

programme.title: The Big Spill
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E20, Mitch helps a former lifeguard, Lane Brody, investigate a corporation suspected of dumping deadly chemicals in the bay.

programme.title: Game of Chance
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E21, Harvey and Mitch go to play poker on an offshore yacht where they are robbed by a masked man that drives an amphibious Jeep. Shauni invites Eddie over for dinner at her parents’ house where her snobbish father strongly disapproves of him.

programme.title: Summer of '85
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E22, Shauni and Eddie visit a local fortune teller who predicts that Eddie will soon meet his first true love. Shauni thought he already had, and that it was her! But it's Lorna, an older woman Eddie had a "Summer of '42" affair with as a teenager.

programme.title: River of No Return, Part 1
programme.desc: Baywatch, S03E01, The mysterious death of Mitch's uncle and the cryptic will he left, finds Mitch, Hobie, Eddie, and Shauni on a whitewater rafting adventure. Meanwhile, rookie lifeguard hopefuls participate in the annual qualifying swim.
